title: Dining Outdoors
name: Dining Outdoors
description:
A Map by Madamegonzaga

Chill out und chow down. Heer eez ze place to list places with patios und outdoor seating that serve tasty food und plenty of it!

properties.name: Atlas Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Fritz  3049 20th St, San Francisco, CA

properties.name: Bagdad Cafe, 2295 Market Street, San Francisco CA
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  Whether you\'re drunk or not, their poostrami sammiches ar ze beast in ze City! Ax fur ze exxxtra dose ov Russian dressing und let ze games begin!

properties.name: Boogaloos
properties.description: Posted by Mcmcilvoy3296 22nd St, San Francisco, CABreif brunch with Lita, Jason, Carrie and Joe. I fled the scene to sit here at work! Man, that sucks!

properties.name: Cafe Reverie
properties.description: Posted by Mcmcilvoy  848 Cole St, San Francisco, CACafe Reverie is Cole Valley\'s communal heart. Patio out back. The sidewalk out front is the home of the Poetry Canvass. We may have missed the butterflies from here. Trying to Find a Botanist My campaign to meet a botanist has never really been on solid footing. Our first mistake was starting our search by agreeing not to go to the one place we could be confident there were botanists, the conservatory of flowers.

properties.name: Chow
properties.description: Posted by Fritz 215 Church St, San Francisco, CA

properties.name: Dolores Park
properties.description: Posted by Fritz  Dolores St and 19th St, San Francisco, CA

properties.name: Mission Creek Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 968 Valencia Street, San Francisco, CA "I leaned forward, and out of the corner of my eye, I saw someone fiddling with the computer cord. I tried to stand up, and as I stepped back, he stabbed me in the chest.\'\'

properties.name: Park Chow
properties.description: Posted by Getbackhomeward  1240 9th Ave, San Francisco, CA

properties.name: Patricia und Baristas ov Martha & Bros. Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  3868 24th Street, San Francisco CA Beastsides ze best mocha on ice in ze weirld, Patricia und her gang ov baristas at Martha\'s in Noe Valley also hav ze bestest smiles in ze weirld! Arooooooooooousing! Free smile in every cup! Beans, caffeine dreenkies, pastries, outdoor seatings, fresh fruits in nicey beeg cups, stuffed muffins, coookies, und community. Now zat\'s wot wot ze Mad Ham lykes in ze caffffeeeeine shoppe. Openeded 5:30 am (KAK!) till 8:00 pm weekdays, und 6:00 am to 7:00 pm on ze weekends. 415.641.4433,

properties.name: Pedro ov Brazil Fresh Squeeze Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  2161 University Avenue, Berkeley, CA Pedro\'s meats ar ze best in all ze Land! Tri-tip! I fluff gettinks ze snakkings und chatties as I wait in line. Mango Smoooooothies! Yip! Yip! Transport yore elf tou meatweirld wif ze mouth-watering goodness ov melt-in-ze-mouth meats. Tastiest meats in ze Bay Area. I ham jonesin\'! Aryooo hear meee? Jonesin\'! for more ov ze saucy goodness. Eevin ze veggies were choice.

properties.name: deli-up cafe
properties.description: Posted by Micque 2200 bryant st. at 20thlots of fresh and delicious deli and full meal selections, daily specials, slight predominance of middle-eastern dishes, early breakfast through late lunch but unfortunately only m-f (closed on weekends). the kicker is there\'s a virtually secret back patio, huge, lots of fruit trees, beautiful and serene, perfect for a tryst OR large group gathering.
